TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_lalu, title = lalu, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/lalu} }

S.FORM: lalu aring htgan la'iy ita 'tayal laga, bi'an ta nya lalu Tayal yaba ta. lalu tayal la'iy ta ga buyun lalu yaba ta nanak. syan lalu ga s'agal ta nya lalu bnkis ta uy, kruma ga syan ta nya lalu 'sinuw,iyat ga syan ta nya lalu khoni' ro lalu na k'man uy. mnanak ci baley lalu ta ro psya'an ci uy,myasa ci baley lalu ta tayal, siyon mu baley.

lalo aring htgan la'iy ita 'tayal laga, bi'an ta nya lalo Tayal yaba ta. lalo tayal la'iy ta ga boyon lalo yaba ta nanak. syan lalo ga s'agal ta nya lalo bnkis ta oy, kroma ga syan ta nya lalo 'sinow,iyat ga syan ta nya lalo khoni' ro lalo na k'man oy. mnanak ci baley lalo ta ro psya'an ci oy,myasa ci baley lalo ta tayal, siyon mo baley.
